name: DeployUsingPowerShell
description: Execute PowerShell commands remotely on machine(s). This task is under Preview, please contact “Devops_Tools@microsoft.com” to enable this task fully on the backend for your account. Please refer http://aka.ms/ci_cd for additional guidance.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the environment for deploying application.​

inputs.name: MachineNames
inputs.label: Deploy to Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally provide a comma separated list of machines to deploy the application to. It defaults to all the machines in the environment. For example, BudgetIT-Web01, BudgetIT-Web02.

inputs.name: SourcePackage
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the application binaries. Variables like $(Build.Repository.LocalPath) can be used for binaries in the Automation Agent. For example, $(Build.Repository.LocalPath)\BudgetIT\Web.

inputs.name: ApplicationPath
inputs.label: Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: Local Path on the target machines for copying the binaries from the source. For example, C:\BudgetIT\Web.

inputs.name: ScriptPath
inputs.label: PowerShell Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the PowerShell script on the target machines or on a UNC path. For example, C:\BudgetIT\Web\Deploy\Website.ps1

inputs.name: InitializationScriptPath
inputs.label: Initialization Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally provide location of the PowerShell initialization script (data script for DSC) on the target machines or on a UNC path. For example, C:\BudgetIT\Web\Deploy\WebsiteConfiguration.ps1

inputs.name: AlternateCredentialsUsername
inputs.label: Alternate Credentials Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username of the alternate credentials required to connect to the VSO service; Not required for TFS OnPrem. See http://aka.ms/ALTCREDENTIALS for more information

inputs.name: AlternateCredentialsPassword
inputs.label: Alternate Credentials Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password of the alternate credentials required to connect to the VSO service; Not required for TFS OnPrem. See http://aka.ms/ALTCREDENTIALS for more information
